name: Eden War
description:
Dark, Light, or forge a new path. Which will you choose?

Eden War is a fantasy hybrid visual novel and strategy RPG. Two sides clash for dominance over Eden: the human followers of the Goddess Veritas, and the Demonic Horde that worships the Goddess Invidia. Your choices during dialogue and battle will determine the fate of Eden.

Inspired heavily by Ogre Battle and other games that offer good vs evil routes such as Black & White, Mass Effect, and Fable. Contains adult themed content, however there are no explicit scenes.

Key Features of Eden War

  • Choices you make determine your alignment with the Goddesses
  • Use your armies to fight against the demonic horde
  • Explore the map, clear the Fog of War, protect your base
  • Liberate cities, find treasure, collect Tarot Cards
  • Use Tarot Cards to tilt the balance of battle in your favor

Still in development, currently the first two battles are available to play. Try it out in the free demo.

If you'd like to support the dev you can with a $5 pre purchase. This grants you access to all future early access versions of the game and eventually the full version of the game. The buy in price will go up the closer to release. Buying this also earns you the Patron role on our discord. 

Features to expect in future releases

  • Additional chapters and battles
  • Reorganize your armies to your liking
  • Units will gain XP and level up
  • Class changes will become available if requirements are met
  • Enemies will drop gold and loot
  • Optional romantic encounters
